feed.title: Category: A Note from Management | Eric Dodds

entry.title: Hello, Internet Traveler
entry.content:
Hello there, Internet Traveler.

My name is Eric Dodds, and you found the blog on my shiny new website. Here’s the skinny:

You can learn more about who I am over here. I enjoy writing and plan to post articles about stuff I find interesting – from company culture to technology to things I’ve learned doing project work at a marketing agency. Some people have told me I have a knack for the written word, but I’ll let you be the judge of that.

Thanks for stopping by, and I look forward to having you over again soon.
